title: add germany back in to apex motors

messages.content: add germany back in to apex motors

Perfect! Germany (DE) has been successfully added back to the Apex Motors campaign targeting.

**Changes Applied:**
- **Geo Targeting Updated:** US, UK → **US, UK, DE**
- **Estimated Impact:** ~8% reach increase by expanding to the German market

**Notifications Sent:**
- ✅ Slack notification sent to #adcp-demo
- ✅ Email draft generated for jasonliew@signal42.ai

The campaign will now serve ads to audiences in Germany along with the US and UK, which should expand your reach and potential conversions in the German market.
